item.description:
Where: Corner Pocket/ Wave Sport Pub 411 Waverley Oaks Road, Suite 204, Waltham, MA

Tel: (781) 894-7011-

Note: Its in the back second Row of industrial Buildings, Building #2.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Web site: http://www.wavesportspub.com/Billiards.html

Friday Night - Free pool from 5:00 pm to 7:00 for all patrons 21 and older.

Join us for Free Pool at the Exclusive Corner Pocket Club from 5:00 to 7:00 pm. We will meet in the Pool Lounge to the right after you walk up the stairs. Meet by the Juke Box and then we will grab some tables.

We will swap/rotate people around in groups to play against each other. You can come after 5PM, but I really do need a few people to come early to snag a few pool tables at 5PM sharp or they will be all gone by 5:10PM!

If people can come early at 5:00PM sharp to help grab 4 tables that would be great.

How to find us: There are many photos of me (Biagio) so you can find me. I will be on the right as you enter the pool hall room please gather by the juke box so I can look for you, if you don't find me!

 

========================================

Directions FROM BOSTON Take Storrow Drive West towards Watertown. After the Harvard Square exit, take the Fresh Pond Parkway exit (Route16). Go over the Bridge and follow signs for Rte 16 Watertown. Take a right after the Star Market onto Belmont Street. This will turn into Trapelo Road. Stay on Trapelo Road / Belmont Street until you come to your third set of lights. At lights take a left onto Route 60, which is Waverley Oaks Road. Less than a ¼ mile down on the left is an industrial park . We are located in building #2. Look for the awing that says THE WAVE SPORTS PUB. FROM RTE 128 Take route 128 towards Waltham to the Trapelo Road exit (28). Follow the signs for Belmont. You will stay on Trapelo Road for approximately 4 ½ miles. You will come to a set of lights and see a sign for Route 60, Waltham. Take that right at lights which is Route 60 / Waverley Oaks Road. Less than a ¼ mile down on the left is an industrial park. We are located in Building #2. Look for the awning that says THE WAVE SPORTS PUB.
item.how_to_find_us: Find Biagio on right as you enter poolhall room and/OR gather by juke box if you come late
item.name: Free Pool (Billiards) Fridays --After Work at the Wave Sport Pub
